types:type.name: twitter-feed-example
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type twitter_feed_example = {| data: Array<{| id: String, text: String, created_at: String, author_id: String |}> |} {"example": "{\\\"data\\\":[{\\\"id\\\":\\\"1323790702577373184\\\",\\\"text\\\":\\\"RT @TeamJoe: New Hampshire, if you are waiting at the polls \u2014 stay in line! If you\u2019re in line, you are guaranteed your right to vote. RT to\u2026\\\",\\\"created_at\\\":\\\"2020-11-04T00:54:32.000Z\\\",\\\"author_id\\\":\\\"939091\\\"}]}"}

types:type.name: socialapi-feed-response
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type socialapi_feed_response = {| owner: String, source: String, feeds: Array<{| message: String, creationDate: String |}> |} {"example": "{\\\"owner\\\":\\\"naresh_saladi\\\",\\\"source\\\":\\\"twitter\\\",\\\"feeds\\\":[{\\\"message\\\":\\\"Folks, time is running out to make your voice heard in this election. If you haven\u2019t voted yet, go to https:\\/\\/t.co\\/EcbUdX2aPs to find your polling place and head there as soon as you can.\\\",\\\"creationDate\\\":\\\"2020-11-03T23:00:01.000Z\\\"}]}"}
